description: Invests in a broad set of companies of all market capitalizations across emerging markets countries and is designed to increase expected returns* by focusing on firms trading at what we believe are lower valuations with higher profitability ratios.**Pursues the benefits associated with indexing (diversification, low turnover, transparency of exposures), but with the ability to add value by making investment decisions using information in current prices.Efficient portfolio management and trading process that is designed to enhance returns while seeking to reduce unnecessary risks and costs for investors.Built to fit seamlessly into an investor's asset allocation.
name: Avantis Emerging Markets Value ETF
